topic.title: Subscribing to project changes via email

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Email updates are one of two methods you can use to receive notification of changes to Mingle projects as they happen (the other way is via Atom feeds).

When you subscribe via email, Mingle emails you straight away to confirm that you have subscribed to project changes that meet the criteria you selected. Each email you receive provides a link that lets you unsubscribe from the current feed.
section.note: Before you can subscribe to project emails, the project administrator must setup SMTP email configuration. You must enter your email address in your Mingle user profile before you can receive emails.

subsection.title: How to subscribe to project changes using email

steps.item: Sign in to Mingle and select the project with the changes you want to view (if not already working within the project).

item.p: Select Filter history items according to the changes you want to monitor.

steps.item: Mingle emails a confirmation to your registered email address describing the changes to which you've subscribed. You will now receive email updates any time project changes match the selected history filters. You can subscribe from the email updates at any time by clicking the Unsubscribe link.
